author: Buddha
message: When you realize how perfect everything is you will tilt your head back and laugh at the sky.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mary Kay Ash
message: For every failure, there's an alternative course of action. You just have to find it. When you come to a roadblock, take a detour.
title: Thought of the day

author: Walter Linn
message: It is surprising what a man can do when he has to, and how little most men will do when they don't have to.
title: Thought of the day

author: Tenzin Gyatso
message: To be aware of a single shortcoming in oneself is more useful than to be aware of a thousand in someone else.
title: Thought of the day
